Title: Trivia
Description: Allows you to create a trivia game from scratch or to load a saved trivia game. Trivia games consist of multiple questions with answers(True False, Multiple Choice, and "Write In"). You can also have a customizable background(Gradient, solid color, Image).
HomeWiki:
Trivia Project Description

Allows you to create a trivia game from scratch or to load a saved trivia game. Trivia games consist of multiple questions with answers(True False, Multiple Choice, and "Write In"). You can also have a customizable background(Gradient, solid color, Image).

It is also very helpfull if you are in College/High School and need to memorize something (ie. elements, formulas, vocabulary words, etc.).

With Trivia, you can create custom trivia games. You can create a custom game with as many of your own questions as you want. Each question can be True\False, Multiple Choice(up to 6 choices), or "Write In"

Features:

  1. Custom Question Button Gradient
  2. Custom Background
    1. Image
    2. Solid Color
    3. Gradient Color (any angle)

Note:
Write In answers have only 1 choice for the answer, but it is not displayed until you want to see the correct answer
